channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Entertainment giant Paramount agrees to a merger with Skydance
item.description: The entertainment giant Paramount will merge with Skydance, closing out a decades-long run by the Redstone family in Hollywood and injecting desperately needed cash into a legacy studio that has struggled to adapt to a shifting entertainment landscape

item.title: Toyota Land Cruiser 70-Series drops V8 diesel, gets new five-speed manual
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Dinosaur skeleton found in U.S. finally finds new home in Europe
item.description: A huge dinosaur skeleton "sort of disappeared" during its transatlantic journey from the U.S. to a museum in Denmark, but as CBS News' Leah Mishkin reports, the 150-million-year-old Camarasaurus Grandis finally made it to its new home.

item.title: Violent holiday weekend sees mass shootings in Michigan, Illinois and Kentucky
item.description: A shooting at a block party in Detroit left two people dead and more than a dozen wounded, capping a violent holiday weekend in the U.S. that also saw mass shootings in Kentucky and Chicago

item.title: Ozempic v. Mounjaro? There's a clear winner for weight loss, study finds.
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Paramount Global, owner of CBS News, to merge with Skydance Media
item.description: Paramount Global, the owner of CBS News, has made a multibillion-dollar deal to merge with the film production company Skydance Media. To make that possible, Skydance is buying another company, National Amusements, controlled by Shari Redstone, which owns the largest share of Paramount Global.

item.title: More than 3 million pass through US airport security in a day for the first time
item.description: Agents for the U.S. Transportation Security Administration on Sunday screened 3 million airline passengers in a single day for the first time ever

item.title: More than 3 million pass through US airport security in a day for the first time as travel surges
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Walmart Deals live blog: Best deals from the rival Prime Day sale
item.description: Walmart's rival Amazon Prime Day sale, Walmart Deals, starts today. Here's everything you need to know to save big.

item.title: Russian missiles target Ukraine, killing 35 and striking children's hospital
item.description: At least 35 people were killed across Ukraine early on Monday, as attacks were launched against five cities, officials said.

item.title: Nvidia Stock Gains as Analysts Lift Targets on Strong Demand for AI Platform

item.title: 3 gold investing moves to boost your portfolio this July
item.description: Gold could boost your investment portfolio this July - especially if you make these three moves.

item.title: France's Macron keeps PM in place for "stability" after chaotic election
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron has refused the resignation of the countryâ€™s prime minister, asking him to remain temporarily as the head of the government after chaotic election results left the government in limbo

item.title: Waters Rise on Galveston Island as Beryl Makes Landfall on Texas Gulf Coast
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: $1 billion donation will make Johns Hopkins medical school free for most
item.description: Students from families earning less than $300,000 won't have to pay any tuition to attend medical school.
